verses.name: 1 Kings 15:19
verses.text: There is a league between me and thee, and between my father and thy father: behold, I have sent unto thee a present of silver and gold; come and break thy league with Baasha king of Israel, that he may depart from me.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:20
verses.text: So Ben–hadad hearkened unto king Asa, and sent the captains of the hosts which he had against the cities of Israel, and smote Ijon, and Dan, and Abel–beth–maachah, and all Cinneroth, with all the land of Naphtali.

verses.name: 1 Kings 15:21
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Baasha heard thereof, that he left off building of Ramah, and dwelt in Tirzah.
